summary: This mod increases all Two-Handed weapons reach from 1.3 to 1.4, to better increase the chance of landing a backwards power attack, except the Headsman\'s Axe, which reach is 1.5 vanilla. Also includes a file for dawnguard and a file for dragonborn.
descriptionHtml:
I didn\'t see a similar mod so i made it myself. This mod increases all Two-Handed weapons (including daedric Two-Handed weapons, such as the ebony blade and volundrung) reach from 1.3 to 1.4, to better increase the chance of landing a backwards power attack, except the Headsman\'s Axe, which reach is 1.5 vanilla. Also includes a file for dawnguard and a file for dragonborn dlcs.

Technical: The Steel Greatswords blade length is approximately 25% longer than the steel sword. The steel swords reach is 1 and the steel greatswords reach is 1.3. This mod would change the steel greatswords reach from 1.3 to 1.4,which is a considerable difference but it is nearly unnoticeable in 1st person and 3rd person views.

Incompatibilities: this mod and the dawnguard and dragonborn mods as well should be incompatible with any mods that alter the vanilla skyrim, vanilla dawnguard, and vanilla dragonborn weapons respectively.
author: BlindxGuardian
